Title: How expectations shape the formation of intrusive memories: An experimental study using the trauma film paradigm
Author: Herzog, Philipp;Barth, Charlotte;Rief, Winfried;Brakemeier, Eva-Lotta;Kube, Tobias

Title: Challenging memories reduces intrusive memories and the memory amplification effect
Author: Li, Chunlin; Otgaar, Henry; Battista, Fabiana; Muris, Peter; Wang, Jianqin
ResultSummary: Challenged items showed lower intrusion frequency than unchallenged items
